products.name: IGP 1/2/3 Internal Gear Pumps (02T series)
products.design: Internal gear pump with fixed displacement
products.applications: Hydraulic systems for plastic machines, shoe machines, presses, and electric forklifts.
products.differentiator: Ultra-low noise, high capacity efficiency even at low speeds, and not sensitive to oil pollution.
products.features: Fixed displacement internal gear design with ultra-low noise operation. High capacity efficiency maintained even at low speeds. Not sensitive to oil pollution, making it ideal for various industrial environments. Suitable for hydraulic systems in plastic machines, shoe machines, presses, and electric forklifts requiring reliable, quiet operation up to 350 bar working pressure and speeds up to 3000 r/min.

products.name: A2F Fixed-Displacement Pump/Motor
products.applications: Hydrostatic drives in open and closed circuits for construction machinery and industrial applications.
products.differentiator: High-performance spheric valve plate rotary group for automatic centering, high efficiency, and long life.
products.features: Fixed-displacement bent axis design featuring a high-performance spheric valve plate rotary group for automatic centering. Delivers high efficiency and extended service life. Suitable for hydrostatic drives in both open and closed circuits for construction machinery and demanding industrial applications.

products.name: A11VO/A11VLO Variable Displacement Pump
products.applications: Open circuit hydrostatic drives, especially in mobile applications.
products.differentiator: Variable displacement for energy saving, with excellent suction performance and a wide range of control options.
products.features: Variable displacement swash plate design optimized for energy-efficient operation. Excellent suction performance with a wide range of control options for precise flow regulation. Displacement range from 40 to 260 mL/r with nominal pressure up to 350 bar and maximum pressure capability up to 400 bar. Ideal for open circuit hydrostatic drives in mobile applications.

products.name: A2FO Fixed-Displacement Bent Axis Pump
products.applications: Hydrostatic drives in open circuits for mobile and industrial applications.
products.differentiator: High power density, optimum efficiency, and a compact, economical design.
products.features: Fixed-displacement bent-axis design with 40-degree tilt for high power density and optimum efficiency. Compact and economical construction ideal for space-constrained applications. Displacement sizes ranging from 10 to 180 cc/rev with nominal pressure up to 400 bar and peak pressure capability up to 450 bar. Suitable for hydrostatic drives in open circuits across mobile and industrial applications.

products.name: A4VSO Variable Displacement Pump
products.applications: Industrial and mobile hydraulic systems, including hydraulic presses, construction machinery, and shipbuilding.
products.differentiator: Precision, efficiency, and durability in high-performance systems, with low noise operation and excellent suction characteristics.
products.features: Variable displacement swash plate design delivering precision, efficiency, and durability for high-performance systems. Low noise operation with excellent suction characteristics for reliable performance. Nominal pressure up to 350 bar and peak pressure up to 400 bar. Ideal for industrial and mobile hydraulic systems including hydraulic presses, construction machinery, and shipbuilding applications.

products.name: A10V(S)O Variable Displacement Axial Piston Pump
products.applications: Open circuit hydrostatic drives for mobile and industrial applications.
products.differentiator: High power density, low noise, and long service life, with a wide range of control options.
products.features: Variable displacement axial piston pump with swash plate design offering high power density and low noise operation. Long service life with a wide range of control options for flexible system integration. Displacement sizes from 10 to 140 cc/rev with nominal pressure up to 280 bar and maximum pressure up to 350 bar. Designed for open circuit hydrostatic drives in mobile and industrial applications.

products.name: A7V Variable Displacement Pump
products.applications: Hydrostatic transmissions in open circuits for industrial equipment and mobile machinery.
products.differentiator: Variable displacement with high-performance rotating components for automatic alignment, high efficiency, and low noise.
products.features: Variable displacement bent axis design with high-performance rotating components providing automatic alignment for optimal performance. High efficiency with low noise operation ideal for demanding applications. Maximum displacement up to 500 mL/r with operating pressure up to 315 bar and peak pressure capability up to 400 bar. Designed for hydrostatic transmissions in open circuits for industrial equipment and mobile machinery.

products.name: A2VK Variable Pump
products.applications: Pumping and metering polyurethane components (polyol and isocyanate).
products.differentiator: High metering accuracy and repeatability of variable flows, compatible with highly viscous fluids.
products.features: Axial piston high-pressure pump designed for precision metering applications. High metering accuracy and repeatability of variable flows with compatibility for highly viscous fluids. Displacement sizes of 12, 28, 55, and 107 cm³ with nominal pressure up to 250 bar and peak pressure up to 315 bar. Ideal for pumping and metering polyurethane components including polyol and isocyanate.

products.name: A8V Variable Double Pump
products.design: Bent-axis axial piston pump with two rotary groups
products.applications: Hydrostatic transmissions for open circuits.
products.differentiator: Two rotary groups in a single housing, with various control options for individual pumps.
products.features: Variable displacement bent-axis axial piston pump featuring two rotary groups integrated in a single compact housing. Various control options available for independent operation of individual pumps. Displacement sizes ranging from 28 to 160 cm³/rev with maximum pressure capability up to 400 bar. Designed for efficient hydrostatic transmissions in open circuits.

products.name: AR Series Axial Piston Pump
products.design: Axial piston pump with variable displacement
products.applications: Machine tools, press machinery, injection molding machines, industrial automation systems.
products.differentiator: Compact, lightweight, energy-efficient with low noise operation and long service life.
products.features: Variable displacement axial piston pump with compact and lightweight design for easy integration. Energy-efficient operation with low noise levels and extended service life. Displacement range from 10 to 22 cm³/rev, speed range from 500 to 1800 RPM, nominal pressure up to 165 bar and maximum pressure up to 210 bar. Suitable for machine tools, press machinery, injection molding machines, and industrial automation systems.

products.name: MV Series Bi-directional Axial Piston Pump
products.applications: Servo applications, heavy machinery lifting, small power units, and challenging industrial and mobile applications.
products.differentiator: Bi-directional operation, low noise level even during full pressure operation, and modular control for simplified system design.
products.features: Variable displacement axial piston pump with bi-directional operation capability. Low noise level maintained even during full pressure operation. Modular control design for simplified system integration and maintenance. Rated pressure up to 175 bar, maximum pressure up to 250 bar at 1800 RPM. Ideal for servo applications, heavy machinery lifting, small power units, and challenging industrial and mobile applications.

products.name: VDP Series Variable Displacement Pump
products.applications: Hydraulic trucks industry and various other applications requiring precise regulation of displacement.
products.differentiator: Small dimensions, light weight, robust construction, low noise levels, and high efficiency.
products.features: Variable displacement axial piston pump with compact dimensions and lightweight construction for easy installation. Robust design with low noise levels and high efficiency for demanding applications. Displacement range from 40 to 109 cm³/rev with nominal pressure up to 410 bar and maximum intermittent pressure up to 450 bar. Designed for the hydraulic trucks industry and applications requiring precise displacement regulation.

products.name: BIF Series Iron Cast Bent Axis Piston Pump
products.applications: Heavy-duty hydraulic systems and mobile applications, especially for trucks.
products.differentiator: Higher pressure capabilities, less pulse, maximum efficiency, and low noise operation.
products.features: Iron cast bent axis piston pump designed for heavy-duty applications with higher pressure capabilities. Reduced pulsation for smooth operation with maximum efficiency and low noise levels. Displacement range from 17 to 81 cm³/rot with operating pressure up to 400 bar and peak pressure up to 450 bar. Ideal for heavy-duty hydraulic systems and mobile applications, particularly truck hydraulics.

products.name: BI Series Single Bent Axis Piston Pump
products.applications: Various hydraulic applications requiring high efficiency and low noise.
products.differentiator: Reversible operation, high volumetric efficiency, and low internal power loss.
products.features: Single bent axis piston pump with reversible operation capability for flexible system design. High volumetric efficiency with low internal power loss for optimized energy consumption. Displacement range from 17 to 172 cc/rev with maximum operating pressure up to 350 bar and peak pressure up to 400 bar. Suitable for various hydraulic applications requiring high efficiency and low noise operation.

products.name: BH Series Straight Piston Pump
products.applications: Various hydraulic applications requiring robust performance and high efficiency.
products.differentiator: Available in single and double fixed displacement configurations, with high resistance materials.
products.features: Straight axial piston pump available in both single and double fixed displacement configurations for versatile applications. Constructed with high resistance materials for durability and robust performance. Displacement range from 14 to 110 cm³/rev with maximum pressure capability up to 450 bar. Designed for various hydraulic applications requiring reliable, high-efficiency operation.

products.name: B2 Series Oil Hydraulic Gear Pump
products.applications: Light-duty hydraulic applications.
products.differentiator: Small, fast to mount, and features a rear inlet/outlet.
products.features: Compact bidirectional hydraulic external gear pump with small footprint for space-constrained installations. Fast and easy mounting with rear inlet/outlet configuration. Displacement from 12 to 39 cc/rot with maximum pressure up to 280 bar and maximum continuous rotation speed of 2500 rpm. Designed for light-duty hydraulic applications requiring economical and reliable fluid power.

products.name: B3 Series Oil Hydraulic Gear Pump
products.applications: Various hydraulic applications requiring robust performance and high efficiency.
products.differentiator: Medium size, fast mounting, and available with rear or side and rear inlet/outlet options.
products.features: Bidirectional hydraulic gear pump with medium-size design for versatile installations. Fast mounting with flexible inlet/outlet options including rear or combined side and rear configurations. Displacement from 38 to 125 cc/rot with maximum continuous pressure up to 300 bar and peak pressure up to 335 bar. Suitable for various hydraulic applications requiring robust performance and high efficiency.

products.name: TPF2G0.5-M High Pressure Gear Pump
products.applications: Industrial applications.
products.differentiator: Unique sealing design for continuous operation up to 250 bar, with modified gear teeth for reduced operating torque.
products.features: High pressure external gear pump with unique sealing design enabling continuous operation up to 250 bar. Modified gear teeth design reduces operating torque for improved efficiency. Flow rate from 0.19 to 2.00 cc/rev with maximum operating pressure up to 250 bar and maximum speed of 7000 RPM. Suitable for demanding industrial applications requiring compact, high-pressure fluid power.

products.name: TPF2G1-M High Pressure Gear Pump
products.applications: Agricultural machinery, hydraulic systems in cranes, loaders, excavators, pressing applications, and industrial automation systems.
products.differentiator: Long service life, unique sealing design for continuous 250 bar operation, and modified gear tooth for lower operating torque.
products.features: High pressure external gear pump engineered for long service life and reliability. Unique sealing design enables continuous operation at 250 bar with modified gear tooth profile for reduced operating torque. Flow rate from 1.4 to 13.8 cc/rev with maximum operating pressure up to 250 bar. Ideal for agricultural machinery, cranes, loaders, excavators, pressing applications, and industrial automation systems.

products.name: TPF2G2-M High Pressure Gear Pump
products.applications: High-performance hydraulic systems.
products.differentiator: Unique sealing design for continuous operation up to 250 bar, special alloy bushes for rigidity, and modified gear teeth for lower operating torque.
products.features: High pressure external gear pump with unique sealing design for continuous operation up to 250 bar. Special alloy bushes provide enhanced rigidity and durability. Modified gear teeth reduce operating torque for improved efficiency. Flow rate from 3 to 30 cc/rev with maximum operating pressure up to 270 bar. Designed for high-performance hydraulic systems demanding reliability and precision.

products.name: CBKP Single, Double & Triple Gear Pump
products.design: External gear pump with aluminum alloy or cast iron housing
products.applications: Engineering machinery, construction machinery, hoisting machinery, mining machinery, drilling machinery, and agricultural equipment.
products.differentiator: High-strength alloy steel gears, roller bearings for overload resistance, and automatic compensation for axial clearance.
products.features: Versatile external gear pump available in single, double, and triple configurations with aluminum alloy or cast iron housing. High-strength alloy steel gears with roller bearings for superior overload resistance. Automatic compensation for axial clearance ensures consistent performance. Single displacement: 32-100 cc/rev, double: 72-200 cc/rev, triple: 140-243 cc/rev, all with maximum pressure up to 250 bar. Ideal for engineering, construction, hoisting, mining, drilling machinery, and agricultural equipment.

products.name: IGP Series High-pressure Internal Gear Pump
products.design: Volumetric displacement pump with internal gears
products.applications: Various hydraulic systems.
products.differentiator: High volumetric performance, low noise levels, and extended lifetime due to optimal load distribution.
products.features: High-pressure volumetric displacement pump with internal gear design for superior performance. High volumetric efficiency with exceptionally low noise levels. Optimal load distribution ensures extended operational lifetime. Displacement range from 3.6 to 251.7 cm³/rev with maximum operating pressure up to 350 bar and maximum speed up to 3000 rpm. Suitable for demanding hydraulic systems requiring precision and reliability.

products.name: TGR Series Helical Silent Gear Pump
products.applications: Industrial hydraulic applications.
products.differentiator: Quiet operation, high efficiency, and long service life due to helical gear design.
products.features: Helical gear pump engineered for exceptionally quiet operation in noise-sensitive environments. Helical gear design provides high efficiency and extended service life through smooth, continuous engagement. Flow rate range from 6 to 290 L/min with maximum continuous pressure up to 270 bar and peak pressure up to 300 bar. Ideal for industrial hydraulic applications where low noise and high performance are critical.

products.name: PV2R1,2,3 Fixed Vane Pump
products.applications: Industrial applications such as manufacturing, machine tools, and injection molding machines.
products.differentiator: High-pressure, high-performance with low noise operation and compact design.
products.features: Fixed displacement vane pump delivering high-pressure, high-performance operation with exceptionally low noise levels. Compact design for easy integration into space-constrained systems. Geometric displacement from 5.8 to 237 cm³/rev with maximum operating pressure up to 21 MPa (3050 PSI) and speed range from 600 to 1800 r/min. Ideal for industrial manufacturing, machine tools, and injection molding machines.

products.name: PV2R5 Fixed Vane Pump (Large Flow)
products.applications: Industrial applications requiring large flow.
products.differentiator: High-performance, fixed displacement with low noise operation and cartridge design for easy maintenance.
products.features: Fixed displacement vane pump optimized for large flow applications with high-performance operation. Low noise design with innovative cartridge construction for simplified maintenance and servicing. Geometric displacement from 230 to 348 cc/rev with maximum operating pressure up to 120 bar and maximum speed of 1800 RPM. Designed for industrial applications requiring substantial hydraulic flow capacity.

products.name: V SERIES High-Performance Intravane Pump
products.design: Fixed displacement, balanced vane type hydraulic pump
products.applications: Industrial and mobile applications, including machine tools, presses, die casting machines, and material handling machinery.
products.differentiator: High volumetric efficiency, low noise levels, and long operating life due to pressure-balanced, modular design.
products.features: High-performance fixed displacement intravane pump with pressure-balanced, modular design for extended operational life. High volumetric efficiency with exceptionally low noise levels ideal for precision applications. Geometric displacement from 7 to 193 cm³/rev with maximum operating pressure up to 207 bar (3000 psi) and speed range from 600 to 1800 r/min. Suitable for industrial and mobile applications including machine tools, presses, die casting machines, and material handling machinery.

products.name: HVP Medium Pressure Variable Vane Pump
products.applications: Various hydraulic applications requiring precise pressure and flow control.
products.differentiator: Low noise operation, high sensitivity and responsiveness, and pressure compensation mechanism for power saving.
products.features: Variable displacement vane pump with low noise operation and high sensitivity for precise control. Pressure compensation mechanism provides significant power savings by matching flow to system demand. Nominal displacement from 16.7 to 22.2 cc/rev with maximum operating pressure up to 140 bar and pressure adjustment range from 15 to 140 kgf/cm². Ideal for hydraulic applications requiring precise pressure and flow control with energy efficiency.

products.name: VPS1,2,3 Servo Vane Pump
products.applications: Servo system applications, mobile applications, heavy machinery lifting, and small power units.
products.differentiator: Fast and low-speed operation with excellent response to switching, and better resistance to oil contamination.
products.features: Fixed displacement servo vane pump designed for fast response and low-speed operation with excellent switching characteristics. Superior resistance to oil contamination for reliable performance in challenging environments. Nominal displacement range from 16 to 180 cc/rev with maximum operating pressure up to 280 bar and maximum speed up to 2800 rpm. Ideal for servo systems, mobile applications, heavy machinery lifting, and small power units requiring precision control.
